text: "Serial Thriller" is a 2006 song by written by Christina Amphlett and performed by Australian singer Brielle Davis. It may also refer to: * Ednör – L'Attaque, a roller coaster that was named Serial Thriller when it was located at Six Flags AstroWorld * Thunderhawk (Michigan's Adventure), a roller coaster that was named Serial Thriller when it was located at Geauga Lake
title: Serial Thriller (disambiguation)
